=== british (Korea 1953) ===

SMOKE grenades
HoB: -1 DRM
Black TH#
OBA: 8B 2R (access: ≤ 2)

* 2nd Line MMC: ELR Replacement → Disrupt
* Canadian squads have Assault Fire
* Royal Marines:
  * Commandos
  * No Non-Qualified Use penalty for RCL
  * No Captured Use penalty for Communist SW
  * Self-Deploy (1TC) & Self-Recombine OK
